content: Hi everyone. Is the patient-everything operation (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/operation-patient-everything.html) being recommended for implementation of payer-to-payer? Is there any IG guidance forthcoming on bulk data formats vs. having the "new" payer page through result sets?
@Mark Scrimshire @Lloyd McKenzie any guidance here?
I don't think there's any further guidance beyond what's here: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-epdx/Overview.html#patient-everything-exchange-via-alternate-secure-transport
